ygData.subject: Re: Begging taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a lvl 16 cleric and taunt with smite.  It delivers 75 dmg before i even get hit by the monsters.  I usually target them at max distance and in a rare
ygData.messageBody:
I am a lvl 16 cleric and taunt with smite. It delivers 75 dmg before i even get
hit by the monsters. I usually target them at max distance and in a rare
occasion get two smites off. Linda


Jeff Portwine wrote:

> From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>
> oh, it's true! I believe that the monsters see a 100pt heal as a 100pt hit
> on them... so if you do a greater heal or a superior heal, it's like a
> really big area effect nuke so far as they are concerned. Heal spells are a
> huge huge taunt...
>
> Eachann Bronzeleaf
> Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Walt Zimbeck <wzimbeck@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, February 17, 2000 7:47 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Begging taunt
>
> >From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
> >
> >I think you are forgetting that we clerics have the best taunt of all in
> our
> >spellbooks. It is called heal. I have even noticed that a bard singing
> >the healing song will pull more critters to them someone doing more damage.
> >Am I mistaken in this or is it really true?
> >
> >Yilari, Cleric of Tunare, Erollisi Marr
> >
> >> From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
> >>
> >> Heh.. it won't work. I mean there may be a slight taunting factor
> >involved
> >> with it... but it is SO slight...
> >> one whack with your mace would do more to taunt a monster than begging
> >> would, and you know that our mace doesn't do much to taunt. At any
> rate,
> >> as clerics we don't really want to taunt. Especially at higher levels,
> >we
> >> just lose precious hit points too fast when monsters start double and
> >triple
> >> attacking for 90 dmg. =)
> >>
> >> -Eachann Bronzeleaf
> >> -Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
> >>
